Interacting with a Network Device
=====
After connecting to a device by running the CiscoAutomationFramework.connect_ssh you receive a
child of this class that is specific to IOS/Nexus based on what is detected you are connected to.
You will have all of the attributes documented here to interact with your Cisco device regardless
of its firmware type.

.. autoclass:: CiscoAutomationFramework.FirmwareBase.CiscoFirmware
   :members:
